saved_searches.name: API Errors
saved_searches.description: All API service errors and exceptions
saved_searches.query: container.name: bowery_api AND (level: error OR status: 5* OR message: *error*)

saved_searches.name: Rate Limiting Events
saved_searches.query: message: *rate_limited* OR status: 429 OR message: *Too many requests*

saved_searches.name: Webhook Processing
saved_searches.query: message: *webhook* OR container.name: bowery_worker AND message: *webhook*

saved_searches.name: Webhook DLQ
saved_searches.description: Failed webhook events moved to dead letter queue
saved_searches.query: message: *DLQ* OR message: *dead letter* OR status: dlq

saved_searches.name: Job Failures
saved_searches.description: Failed BullMQ jobs and retry attempts
saved_searches.query: container.name: bowery_worker AND (message: *failed* OR message: *error* OR level: error)

saved_searches.name: Token Refresh Events
saved_searches.description: OAuth token refresh attempts and failures
saved_searches.query: message: *token* AND (message: *refresh* OR message: *expired* OR message: *401*)

saved_searches.name: Content Approval Workflow
saved_searches.description: Content approval and publishing workflow events
saved_searches.query: message: *content* AND (message: *approve* OR message: *schedule* OR message: *publish*)

saved_searches.name: Database Errors
saved_searches.query: message: *database* OR message: *postgres* OR message: *connection* AND level: error

saved_searches.name: Redis Issues
saved_searches.query: message: *redis* OR message: *cache* AND level: error

saved_searches.name: High Response Times
saved_searches.description: API requests with high response times
